TEXT.TITLE: NORRIS OIL CO <NOIL> DEC 31 YEAR LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Shr loss 1.55 dlrs vs loss 52 cts Net loss 13,191,000 vs loss 2,254,000 Revs 1,179,000 vs 2,003,000 Avg shrs 8,520,000 vs 4,330,000 Note: Current year loss includes 11.8 mln dlr writedown of oil and gas properties under full cost accounting method. Reuter
